creditline: Gift of Mrs. Eugene J. Carpenter and Olivia Carpenter Coan in memory of Eugene J. Carpenter
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: plate, blue on white porcelain; figures of three people in a pagoda in the center;  five medallions containing fruit in outer rim, separated by a diapered quatrefoil mosaic; Kangxi mark in double circle on bottom
title: Plate, Blue and White Porcelain
